sourcesContent:
import { Box, Button, Grid, Typography } from '@material-ui/core'
import React from 'react'
import useStyles  from './HeroElement'
import video from './../../videos/video.mp4'

import media from '@material-ui/core/useMediaQuery'


const Hero = () => {
    const classes = useStyles()
    const matches = media(classes.breakpoints.up('sm'));
    return (
        <>
           <Box component='section' className={classes.container}>
               <Box className={classes.video}>
                   <video src={video} autoPlay loop muted />
               </Box>
               <Box className={classes.content}>
                  <Grid container  direction='column' spacing={4}>
                      <Grid item>
                          <Typography  variant='h2'>ENJOY THE SHOW</Typography>
                      </Grid>
                      <Grid item>
                          <Typography >Lorem ipsum dolor sitssss ssss amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Ex, ut.</Typography>
                      </Grid>
                      <Grid item>
                         <Button variant='contained'>Get started</Button>
                      </Grid>
                  </Grid>
               </Box>
           </Box>
        </>
    )
}

export default Hero
